name: Mother Truckin' Taxes
description:
You’ve been procrastinating on your taxes as usual, but this time you’ve gone too far. The deadline to submit your taxes to the IRS is in a few minutes and you haven’t even started. Looks like you’ll have to drive straight to the IRS to drop them off and finish your paperwork on the way. We hope you’re good at multitasking! Oh, and make sure to fill out your taxes correctly. Your refund depends on it!

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys to drive, Mouse to write on the form.

Credits:

Javier Olazabal - Environment Art

Neil Sveri - Programming

Chris Hertwig - Tech Art

Bert Olazabal - Audio and Design 

Cat Schmitz - Design
